segments.text: Good morning . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to place a long-distance call to London . Is this the right counter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Here's a booking form . Please write down the number you wish to call , the name of the person you want to talk to , and your own name for our reference .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Can you tell me when I will be able to get through ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say . It depends on how busy the lines are . Please take a seat over there . We'll try to put you through as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
